dt: {bc}any of a genus ({it}Helianthus{/it}, especially {it}H. annuus{/it}) of New World composite plants with large yellow-rayed flower heads bearing edible seeds that yield an edible oil

shortdef: any of a genus (Helianthus, especially H. annuus) of New World composite plants with large yellow-rayed flower heads bearing edible seeds that yield an edible oil
